titleStmt.title: A revievv of ten publike disputations or conferences held vvithin the compasse of foure yeares, vnder K. Edward & Qu. Mary, concerning some principall points in religion, especially of the sacrament & sacrifice of the altar. VVherby, may appeare vpon how vveake groundes both catholike religion vvas changed in England; as also the fore-recounted Foxian Martyrs did build their new opinions, and offer themselues to the fire for the same, vvhich vvas chiefly vpon the creditt of the said disputations. By N.D.
Review of ten publike disputations.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

titleStmt.title: A revievv of ten publike disputations or conferences held vvithin the compasse of foure yeares, vnder K. Edward & Qu. Mary, concerning some principall points in religion, especially of the sacrament & sacrifice of the altar. VVherby, may appeare vpon how vveake groundes both catholike religion vvas changed in England; as also the fore-recounted Foxian Martyrs did build their new opinions, and offer themselues to the fire for the same, vvhich vvas chiefly vpon the creditt of the said disputations. By N.D.
Review of ten publike disputations.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Also issued as part 5 of: Parsons, Robert. "A treatise of three conversions of England", published in 1603 (STC 19416).
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
